mapper.update: update order set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, order_money = #{orderMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_date = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, user_id, goods_id, order_money, create_date, modify_date from order
mapper.insert: insert into order (id, user_id, order_money, create_date, modify_date) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orderMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, now(), now())
mapper.update: update order set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, order_money = #{orderMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, modify_date = now() where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, user_id, order_money, create_date, modify_date from order
